aws_sns_platform_application.description: Provides an SNS platform application resource.

name.description: The friendly name for the SNS platform application

platform.description: The platform that the app is registered with. See [Platform][1] for supported platforms.

platform_credential.description: Application Platform credential. See [Credential][1] for type of credential required for platform. The value of this attribute when stored into the Terraform state is only a hash of the real value, so therefore it is not practical to use this as an attribute for other resources.

event_delivery_failure_topic_arn.description: SNS Topic triggered when a delivery to any of the platform endpoints associated with your platform application encounters a permanent failure.

event_endpoint_created_topic_arn.description: SNS Topic triggered when a new platform endpoint is added to your platform application.

event_endpoint_deleted_topic_arn.description: SNS Topic triggered when an existing platform endpoint is deleted from your platform application.

event_endpoint_updated_topic_arn.description: SNS Topic triggered when an existing platform endpoint is changed from your platform application.

failure_feedback_role_arn.description: The IAM role permitted to receive failure feedback for this application.

platform_principal.description: Application Platform principal. See [Principal][2] for type of principal required for platform. The value of this attribute when stored into the Terraform state is only a hash of the real value, so therefore it is not practical to use this as an attribute for other resources.

success_feedback_role_arn.description: The IAM role permitted to receive success feedback for this application.

success_feedback_sample_rate.description: The percentage of success to sample (0-100)

id.description: The ARN of the SNS platform application

arn.description: The ARN of the SNS platform application
